meaningMnemonic: Have you heard the tale of the <radical>woman</radical> who fell in love with a <radical>coat rack</radical> during a full <radical>moon</radical> and made him her <kanji>groom</kanji>? It's a true story! She even had a wedding ceremony and had more coat racks sitting in the groom's side. The moon will make people do craaaazy things.
readingMnemonic: The best part of the story is that the only coat on the coat rack <kanji>groom</kanji> was a <reading>moo</reading>se <reading>co</reading>at (むこ). So the groom was a really skinny stick with a giant moose hair coat hanging down it.
